thread.title: LeBron James took a flying knee to his junk and went down writhing in pain
thread.title_full: LeBron James took a flying knee to his junk and went down writhing in pain

author: Kristian Winfield
title: LeBron James took a flying knee to his junk and went down writhing in pain
text:
Ouch.
Boxing great Floyd Mayweather is known most for his dominance inside the ring, but also for coining the phrase “protect yourself at all times.” LeBron James must not have gotten the memo.
In the fourth quarter of the Cavaliers ’ matchup against the Wizards , James took a vicious flying knee to the groin from Wizards big man Jason Smith. He lay down on the court curled up in pain.
We’ve all been hit in the junk before, but not when running full speed at the basket. And definitely not by someone doing their all to stop an easy layup.
You’ve gotta feel for LeBron on this one, no matter what your position on him is.
